titles.title: Are you washed in the blood?

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Are you washed in the blood,
In the soul cleansing blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Are your garments spotless?
Are they white as snow?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: Have you been to Jesus for the cleansing power?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Are you fully trusting in His grace this hour?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Are you walking daily by the Saviour’s side?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: Do you rest each moment in the Crucified?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: When the Bridegroom cometh will your robes be white?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: Will your soul be ready for the mansions bright,
And be washed in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines: Lay aside the garments that are stained with sin,
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines: There’s a fountain flowing for the soul unclean,
O be washed in the blood of the Lamb
